thread.title: Tkay Maidza on Art, Songwriting, and Creating Forward-Thinking Music
thread.title_full: Tkay Maidza on Art, Songwriting, and Creating Forward-Thinking Music

author: VICE Staff
title: Tkay Maidza on Art, Songwriting, and Creating Forward-Thinking Music
text:
Tkay Maidza on Art, Songwriting, and Creating Forward-Thinking Music In this video, the rising rapper explains her love of writing music and playing shows. 
This article is presented by Nike as part of Air Max Month, which celebrates the enduring legacy of the Air Max 
At 20 years old, Tkay Maidza has already lived many lives. Among them, she's been a rising tennis star who trained with Lleyton Hewitt's former coach, and an academic overachiever who graduated high school at 16 before studying architecture at university. 
But Maidza is known for another of her passions: music. She decided to drop out of uni to focus on her hip-hop career after her debut single "Brontosaurus" began attracting attention well beyond her local music scene in Adelaide. 
Since then, she's toured with Charli XCX and collaborated with Killer Mike on her first album, Tkay . 
Nike featured Maidza as part of Air Max Month. You can watch the video below, where she talks about the freedom that comes with songwriting and her lifelong love of art and images. 
Air Max Month celebrates the shoe that changed the sneaker world 30 years ago, and has continued to captivate generations of fans since. You can find out more about Air Max Month and the future of the revolution here
